      • isRegister

        public boolean isRegister()
        Indicate if the device is synchronized with the environment of the application. If not, you can run the register().
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        True if the device is correctly synchronized with the application environment.

        Indicate if the device is synchronized with the environment of the application. If not, you can run the register().

      • register

        public boolean register()
        Register the device with the application environment. If the device is already setup in environment, the accessory will be updated with UID. If not, the accessory stay no register.
        Specified by:
        register in interface Device
        Returns:
        True if the device is correctly synchronized with the application environment.
        See Also:
        Device.register()

      • unregister

        public boolean unregister()
        Unregister the device with the application environment. If device is unreachable on the network the unregister() will be call.
        Specified by:
        unregister in interface Device
        Returns:
        True if the device is correctly unregister with the application environment.
        See Also:
        com.connectlife.coreserver.environment.device.Device#unynchronize()
